name: Blood Virus Shooter
description:
Hi Everyone 

This game is one of the concept that I had about Virus shooter [Blood cleaner from virus] witch I made it in Godot engine. its very easy to play and please leave me your feedback in the comment to let me know what are you thinking.
I`ll be happy to hear your idea and feedback to complete this game.
so far it has 40 levels and 4 kind of virus. [it will be more in update version]

I suppose to make it on COVID period but that is good that its over.

Move:
- Mouse left and right movement [very easy to control]

Thanks for your feedback and support ;)
